M

main(String[]) - Static method in class chinesecheckers.Launcher
Launches the event loop.
Menu - Class in chinesecheckers.ui
Represents the game menu which starts the event loop containing the sub menus and the game.
Menu() - Constructor for class chinesecheckers.ui.Menu
 
Minimax - Class in chinesecheckers.ai
Represents a deterministic AI based on the Minimax algorithm with a randomized final tie breaker.
Minimax(State) - Constructor for class chinesecheckers.ai.Minimax
Creates a Minimax AI tuned to the given state of the game.
Mode - Enum Class in chinesecheckers.ai
Defines the strategy and/or quality of the moves chosen by AI
Move - Class in chinesecheckers.util
Represents a move from an origin virtual position to a destination virtual position.
Move(VirtualPosition, VirtualPosition, Piece) - Constructor for class chinesecheckers.util.Move
Creates an object representing a move originating at origin and arriving at destination the path between the origin and destinations is omitted in this constructor.
Move(VirtualPosition, VirtualPosition, Piece, List<VirtualPosition>) - Constructor for class chinesecheckers.util.Move
Creates an object representing a move originating at origin, arriving at destination while passing through a list of positions specified at moveChain.
movePiece(Move) - Method in class chinesecheckers.util.State
Updates this piecePositionMap according to the specified move.
